Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; MUSE Operations <MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com>; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE OPENING | (Devialet - Dubai Mall ) 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of DEVIALET– DUBAI MALL.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 11th Feb 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team, @Sarah Hachoumi <mailto:Sarah.Hachoumi@chalhoub.com> @Bhavya Bhatia <mailto:Bhavya.Bhatia@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Elbahr <mailto:Mohamed.Elbahr@chalhoub.com> @Devialet Dubaimall <mailto:Devialet.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT team @Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Ahmed Zakaria <mailto:Ahmed.Zakaria@chalhoub.com> 
*	Admin team @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com> @Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com> @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
*	Maintenance team @Sajumon Shanmughan <mailto:Sajumon.Shanmughan@chalhoub.com> @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com> @Sreeraj Prakasam <mailto:Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com> 
*	GA team @Mohammed El Neel <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com> @Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com> @Salwa Al Mamari <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com> 
*	Accounts @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Rauf <mailto:Mohamed.Rauf@chalhoub.com> 
*	Logistics / Warehouse @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*	3d TEAM : @Chadi Dagher <mailto:Chadi.Dagher@3d-consultants.com> 
*	Muse team @Aparna Gopalakrishnan <mailto:Aparna.Gopalakrishnan@chalhoub.com> 
*	Kronos @Irfan Yusuf <mailto:Irfan.Yusuf@chalhoub.com> 
*	Shopper Track @Abdulrahaman Raffi <mailto:Abdulrahaman.Raffi@chalhoub.com>

Date: 2025-02-13 10:24
Subject: RE: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE OPENING | (Devialet - Dubai Mall ) 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Nasser, 

 

Thank you for the warm wishes! This milestone marks an exciting new chapter for us with our flagship store in Dubai Mall. We cant wait for what’s ahead.

 

Dear Dubai Mall’s team and all our incredible Chalhoub support colleagues (RSO, 3D, Leasing, Supply & Ops, Admin, IT etc)

 

We are beyond grateful for your support in making our store opening happening on time, despite the tight deadline. Your hard work made all the difference.

Reaching this milestone wouldn’t have been possible without your incredible support! We deeply appreciate the time, effort, and resources invested to help us open our doors successfully.

 

Looking forward to seeing you all visiting our store soon!

 

Kind regards

 

 

SARAH HACHOUMI​​​​

MANAGER ‑ SALES MANAGEMENT

MICHEL CHALHOUB TRADING CO LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

	+971505079084

 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 


‑

ons@chalhoub.com <mailto:MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com> >; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com <mailto:Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE OPENING | (Devialet - Dubai Mall ) 

 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of DEVIALET– DUBAI MALL.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 11th Feb 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team, @Sarah Hachoumi <mailto:Sarah.Hachoumi@chalhoub.com> @Bhavya Bhatia <mailto:Bhavya.Bhatia@chalhoub.com> @Mohamed Elbahr <mailto:Mohamed.Elbahr@chalhoub.com> @Devialet Dubaimall <mailto:Devialet.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com>

*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>
